service.description: Deletes OrderRoutingRun records older than a specified number of days.

actions.script: import org.moqui.context.ExecutionContext import org.moqui.entity.EntityCondition ExecutionContext ec = context.ec Calendar basisCal = ec.user.getCalendarSafe() basisCal.add(Calendar.DAY_OF_YEAR, (int) - daysToKeep) basisTimestamp = new Timestamp(basisCal.getTimeInMillis()) recordsRemoved = ec.entity.find("moqui.service.job.ServiceJobRun") .condition("startTime", EntityCondition.LESS_THAN, basisTimestamp) .disableAuthz().deleteAll()
